Class BigTwoTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • BigTwoTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CardGameTable

    public class BigTwoTable
extends java.lang.Object
implements CardGameTable
    The BigTwoTable class implements the CardGameTable interface, which is used to render a GUI for the game. This class also handles user actions.

    The following is the original GUI design of the game. At implementation, all contents showing in the playerTables are rendered directly throw the bigTwoPanel.

    The following is the Use Case diagram. of this game. The use case is relatively simple at this stage.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BigTwoTable(CardGame game)
      Public constructor of the class, used for constructing the instance of the class, associated the table with the BigTwo game, loading images and creating a GUI frame.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearChatArea()
      This method clears the chat message area of the table.
      void clearMsgArea()
      This method clears the message area of the table.
      void disable()
      This method disables user interactions with GUI by disabling the Play and Pass buttons, which Normally is called immediately after game ends.
      void enable()
      This method enables user interactions with GUI by enabling the Play and Pass buttons.
      java.lang.String getMessage()
      This method is used to get the message in the message area in the table, for example, for the purpose of saving the game log.

      Gets the array of cards selected, as specifying in card indices.
      void loadImages()
      This method load Images for this GUI.

      Prints the message string to the message area in the table.

      This method is used for repainting the GUI.
      void reset()
      This method is used for resetting the GUI when the connection is lost
      void resetSelected()
      This methods resets the list of cards selected, which is useful for repainting after invalid selection.

      Sets the index of the current active player;

      • repaint

        public void repaint()
        This method is used for repainting the GUI. This method should be called whenever there is a change in active player. Normally after the CheckMove() method in BigTwo class.
        Specified by:
        repaint in interface CardGameTable

      • printMsg

        public void printMsg(java.lang.String msg)
        Prints the message string to the message area in the table. A newline character will be automatically printed for every message.

        Parameters:

        public void loadImages()
